timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: I think we should have left, inner, full, and cross as the join types.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: See earlier comment about supported join types.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: Let's make this optional and default to toOne.
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: What about SQL generation tests for these different joins.  Are there any dialect differences?
timeline.author: aklish

              to: Country

              definition: '{{ playerCountry.id}} = {{country_id}}'
           },

replies.bodyText: placeholder changes only  in this PR, will add support for these join types in another PR.
